title: WTB: T206 HOFer w/ Uzit or Cycle 460 or any green Cobb
author: David R

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 HOFer w/ Uzit or Cycle 460 or any green Cobb
posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy a T206 hall of famer with a Uzit or Cycle 460 back.  I am also looking for a green Cobb (any back) and a red Cobb with a rarer back.  Please let me know if you have one for sale or trade.  Thanks.

David R
Still looking if anyone has one.  Thanks.
Please email me if you have one for sale in the PSA 1-4 (or SGC equivalent) range.  Thanks.

$1,200 delivered, including insurance and delivery confirmation on the package.   PayPal, Google Checkout, or USPS Money Orders accepted...
